name: Gawyn_Arden
content: Gawyn Arden was a descendent of Deredith Arden, founder of Salis D'aar on Bakura. A vocal opponent of the Galactic Empire, Arden was arrested by Governor Wilek Nereus during a purge of the Bakuran government. Tortured by Imperial Intelligence, Arden did not survive despite the best efforts of Medical Supervisor Sena Pakkallo.
